title: Eye gouged guy had his first mention at Court this PM

replies.msg:
The 22-year old fresh grad, who had his eye gouged by the police & bit off the tip of an officer’s finger, had his first mention at Court this PM
#HongKongProtest #antiELAB #HongKong #PoliceState #HumanRights
(1/5) https://t.co/Tfr0Fpc2uY

Prosecutor claimed that more time is needed to gather evidence, and the request to postpone hearing to 10 Sept was granted
(2/5)

The defendant is charged with 1 count of assault on police officer, 2 counts of assault with intent to commit offence, and fail to produce proof of identity
(3/5) https://t.co/XjaSsCznAL

Prosecutor said that the defendant committed serious crimes including attacking police officers with one commander suffering from bone fracture. Prosecutor requested the defendant to be remanded in custody claiming he’s likely to commit crime again
(4/5) https://t.co/sdzkiG8VrV

In exchanged, defendant agreed to hand in passport on top of a HK$10k bail. On top of these, the Court ordered the defendant (1) not to leave #HongKong, (2) not to enter New Town Plaza, & (3) report to police station every Mon, Wed & Sun until trial date
(5/5) https://t.co/hNVdVNDIAN
